r.s: A class for interacting with the Technorati API
r.d:
Services_Technorati is a wrapper for the REST-based Technorati webservices API. Technorati is a blog search engine that provides a number of interfaces for interacting with recent blog entries, such as searching for entries that link to a certain URL, are linked from a certain URL, or have been given certain tags.
Services_Technorati provides an interface to all of the query types in Technorati API version 1.0, and supports filesystem caching of query data using Cache_Lite.
r.n: Cleaned up factory method. This should now be the standard way to instantiate No longer dependent on Cache_Lite (instead accepts handle for external cache) Added initial unit tests
